body.raw: {"input_text": "Patient is a 60-year-old male with a history of high blood pressure and high cholesterol. He experiences chest pain that worsens with physical activity and has a family history of heart disease. The patient also reports shortness of breath and fatigue after minimal exertion."}

{"input_text": "The patient is a 55-year-old female who has been a heavy smoker for 30 years. She reports chronic coughing, coughing up blood, and chest pain. She also experiences wheezing and shortness of breath, especially at night. The patient has a history of exposure to occupational hazards and air pollution."}
